titleStmt.title: Study to be quiet: or, A short vievv of the miseries of warre, with the necessity of peace. Also, the character of a peaceable man: whose motto is, I am for peace, Psal. 120. vers. 7.. [sic] / By a dyer.
titleStmt.author: A Dyer.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
